mapper.select: select r.role_name from user_role ur left join role r on r.id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select id, username, phoneNumber, email, status, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(updateTime/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTime, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(createTime/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime from user;
mapper.update: update user set status=#{status} ,updateTime=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())*1000 where id = #{userId}
update user set password=#{userInfo.password} where id = #{userInfo.id}
